clues.text: In 2001 Goran Ivanisevic needed a wild card entry to qualify for this tournament but went on to win the gentlemen's singles

The 1997 Denver Broncos won a wild card game, 2 more playoff games & then Super Bowl 32 behind this Hall of Fame QB
North Korea's Kye Sun-hui used a wild card entry to the 1996 Atlanta Games & some nifty trips & throws to win gold in this sport
Santa Claus derives his name from the Dutch Sinterklaas, a legendary figure based on this saint
The Dutch may not have invented this distilled spirit, but they did give it its name from words meaning "burnt wine"
This word from Dutch means to join 2 pieces of something together, like film or fragments of DNA
You can have the whole kit & this, or just the whole this, from Dutch for all one's possessions
Once part of New Netherland, Coney Island is believed to have been named from the Dutch word for these animals found in the area
Called "Il Duce", he made a speech in January & became dictator of his country
In March millions tuned in on their radios to hear this president get sworn in for a new term

Traditional spiced holiday cookie shaped like a person that's a musical about Don Quixote

University city southwest of Toledo, Ohio featuring Sam-I-Am & his edible offering
16th century comedy drama with Costard the Clown & the interplanetary Robinson family

Name changes in Genesis include Sarai to Sarah, Abram to Abraham & this guy's name changed to Israel
Matthew 26 recounts Judas Iscariot making his deal to identify & betray Jesus for this amount of money
When the 39 books of the Old Testament in the King James Bible are listed alphabetically, they run from Amos to this prophet
This country's 40-mile coastline on the North Sea includes the city of Ostend

Bridgetown is the capital of this island country of the Caribbean Sea

This 4-letter world capital is the largest city on the Caspian Sea--so what if the Caspian Sea isn't actually a sea? Who cares?

King's 1st name was originally Michael, but inspired by a visit to this country, his father changed both his own & his son's names
King wrote, "this courageous New Englander's... choice of jail" was his first contact with nonviolent resistance theory
With a dissertation comparing Paul Tillich & Henry N. Wieman, in 1955 King earned his PhD from Boston University in this -ology
At King's funeral, this gospel singer & close friend sang the hymn "Precious Lord, Take My Hand"

Psychology's "Hierarchy of" these says that more basic ones like food must be met before loftier ones

rounds.text: An online article about this landmark said, "The stones themselves look like they are crying" & mentioned "tears of ... pain, hope & joy"
